title: Software Engineer at SingleStore - 3 YOE
content:
Education: B.Tech From Tier 3 College
Years of Experience: 3 YOE
Prior Experience: Product-Based Startup
Company: SingleStore
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Remote
Salary: 38L
Performance Bonus: 10% of Salary
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 1L
Stock bonus: 5000 Units Esops [42L]
Total Comp - 1st Year (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 53.3L
Benefits: $500 WFH Setup, INR 1250/- per month for Health Care, INR 1000/- per month for Internet, Swags, and other Standard Insurance Benefits

I attend the react.js drive and got selected. HR discussion was done, but I feel like the base is too low , when i asked the HR she told this is the maximum. Please input your thoughts on this.
